sentences.english: Oh，they look just like live cranes.
sentences.chinese: 哦，這些仙鶴看上去就像真的一樣。
嬌虎，靈蛇，仙鶴，猿猴，螳螂。

sentences.english: Look at this white crane, and also these flowers; they look very real.
sentences.chinese: 瞧這隻仙鶴，還有這些花，跟真的似的。

sentences.english: An attractively enamelled turquoise earthenware bottle vase depicting two cranes in flight.
sentences.chinese: 一件精美的松石綠釉陶瓶，上有兩隻飛翔的仙鶴。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic effect of Xianhe Qiangxin Pills(Pill of agrimony for strengthening the heart) on heart failure due to coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察仙鶴強心丸治療冠心病心力衰竭的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: The cranes form a garland in the pretence of flight.
sentences.chinese: 仙鶴組成一道花環，佯裝着起飛。

sentences.english: But this is my room. property of Crane .
sentences.chinese: 這是我的房間，仙鶴地產。

sentences.english: If you stretch out a greedy hand to it, it will fly high away like a red-crowned crane.
sentences.chinese: 如果你向它伸出貪婪的手，它就會像仙鶴凌空飛去。

definition: (myth.) peaches of immortality, kept by Xi Wangmu/fresh or confectionery peaches offered as a birthday gift
(bird species of China) common pheasant (Phasianus colchicus)
(bird species of China) Siberian crane (Grus leucogeranus)
to offer birthday congratulations (to an elderly person)
(bird species of China) Eurasian magpie (Pica pica)
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
(bird species of China) red-crowned crane (Grus japonensis)
kesi or k’o-ssu, Chinese silk tapestry woven in a pictorial design
